annotations.description: Looking for something hard and bitter? I've got a real life recipe for Tifa's Cosmo Canyon from Final Fantasy 7 Remake. Limit Break! After years in developme...
annotations.title: Final Fantasy 7 Cosmo Canyon | How to Drink

textContent:
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Lime Juice
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Amaro Nonino
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Cura√ßao

1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. absolut citron lemon vodka

Shaken and strain into coupe
Omit lime and garnish with lime twist for a stirred version.
